A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a perfect movie\, but still an interesting take on the Star Wars universe. Our biggest complaint about TFA was “too formulaic” and “not original”. Here we have an honest shot at carrying a story that is nothing but ordinary and fanboys seem hellbent on crying foul. Johnson threw out a lot of what you expected from Star Wars and made a fresh new film\, where your heroes are flawed (very flawed) and your nostalgia is a thing of the past. This brought forward a new Star Wars generation and I applaud the attempt. Still had problems but I’m willing to forgive. Editing review: giving an extra half star. Seriously\, the people dropping 0-2 star reviews need to slow their role and enjoy a well shot and enjoyable movie. Still\, not perfect\, but I’m very happy with this film’s place in Star Wars lore.
